backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, SOS snapshots, and authorization‑gated CRUD operations using storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two QR‑removal features, their touched files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions of each component’s purpose in the app.
Manual smoke-test checklist for validating flyer download, share dialog export, link sharing, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light and dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all app routes, layouts, and flyer auto-export search param validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permissions, offering navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks admin role and renders a loading state or access denied screen accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Guards routes by checking for an authenticated Internet Identity and displays a login prompt if absent.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with header, optional sidebar navigation for authenticated users, mobile menu, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation menu that adapts to user role and highlights the current route, triggering navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top header with branding, share button, optional emergency lookup link, and login control.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages creation, display, rotation, and copying of a user's emergency access code and principal ID.
Form for saving next-of-kin and health information tied to the user's emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a basic profile by entering their name.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Handles file selection, validation, upload progress, and submission of license and ID documents for user verification.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Generates a printable preview flyer displaying branding, platform details, and a share URL.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Provides a dialog for generating, copying, sharing, and navigating to flyer views using a generated app share URL.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Displays emergency contact info and last known SOS location for first responders, including map links and timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: Generates a QR code on a canvas with timeout, abort handling, and status tracking for readiness or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, verification, places, and mutations wrapping backend actor calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a random access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a robust clipboard copy function with secure-context checks and a fallback method.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty placeholder file for DOM-to-PNG utilities.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size and type and provides a byte-size formatting helper.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Renders a flyer element onto a canvas and exports it as a PNG with custom drawing logic.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps the browser geolocation API in a Promise and returns coordinates or detailed errors.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place category enums to labels and provides category lookup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Empty placeholder file for QR utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a standards-based QR code generator including Galois field math and Reed-Solomon ECC.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Downloads a canvas as a PNG after validating readiness.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Provides a URL-sharing helper using the Web Share API with clipboard fallback and detailed status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app’s canonical share URL based on window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date and bigint timestamps and formats dates for display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Utilities to get and remove URL parameters for both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page allowing authenticated users to submit a new place with name, category, location, and description.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating and submitting a new route with start, destination, waypoints, and date-time.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin interface to lookup user profiles and approve or reject verification requests.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Page for entering a principal and access code to retrieve emergency information for responders.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates and downloads a flyer preview, supporting auto-export via URL params and manual export or link copying.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing feature highlights and redirecting authenticated users to the places page.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected place, including category, description, and submitter.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists safe places with search and category filtering plus navigation to add new places.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user profile and embedded emergency and verification sections behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder view for route details with a back button.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Shows user routes and allows searching routes by principal, with navigation to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the user's emergency SOS card, fetching profile and emergency data and showing a loading or empty state as needed.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Provides UI to capture a one-time SOS location snapshot and navigate to the SOS card view.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing QR‑related issues, temporary removal requirements, and feature requests.
